comment.author: 28958554@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called The Glocal Project: An Experiment in Mass Collaboration, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: A pic showing a similar stage of construction appeared in the Sydney Mail in May 1911...the Sydney Mail pic might have been from their photo archive - news.google.com/newspapers?id=0eZUAAAAIBAJ&sjid=E5IDA... ; here's another one which appeared the following week - news.google.com/newspapers?id=0uZUAAAAIBAJ&sjid=E5IDA... ; Sydney Mail, May 1914 - news.google.com/newspapers?id=4_koAAAAIBAJ&sjid=FpIDA...
